Nerangs.ab: ParagnaLL2.3.1 Var. a (Mss. K7, RJ, RKS):
pas yaθā ahū vairiiō dō vāǧ goftan
"Then he has to recite two Yaθā ahū Vairiiō and say the vāǧ."
va yaθā ahū vairiiō do goftan yas. tā āfrināmi ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō aṣ̌əm vohi fe sar ne avāyat goftan
"He should recite two Yaθā ahū Vairiiō and yasnəmca vaɱəmca aōjasca zauuarəca āfrīnāmi (with teh šnūman) ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō. He should not recite the Aṣ̌əm Vohū at the end."
